name: Awtomic
headline: Dollar Shave Club as a platform.
description: Awtomic powers DTC brands with an easy-to-use subscription management and discovery platform. Starting with a Shopify app, we'll give merchants the subscription product power of premium subscription brands like Dollar Shave Club and Ipsy. As we grow our support for more eCommerce platforms and merchants, we'll help customers discover new brands through cross-sells and make it easier for them to manage their subscriptions in one place.

founders.name: Emily Yuhas, Founder
founders.description: As.a Product leader, I've worked on a breadth of problems, including building a cross-platform Checkout flow for Eventbrite, automating tour scheduling for Redfin and launching Xbox One. Bundle originated from a desire to help my sister, who founded a DTC beauty brand and was frustrated by the many limitations of her subscription app.

**Awtomic: Revolutionizing Subscription Management for DTC Brands**

Founded in 2020 and part of the Y Combinator Batch S20, Awtomic is a Seattle-based company that's turning the subscription model on its head, especially for Direct-To-Consumer (DTC) brands. If you've ever marveled at the seamless subscriptions offered by the likes of Dollar Shave Club or Ipsy, Awtomic aims to put that power in the hands of every merchant.

**The Core Mission**  
Awtomic's mission is straightforward: to empower DTC brands with a user-friendly subscription management and discovery platform. Initially launched as a Shopify app, Awtomic enables merchants to integrate premium subscription functionalities into their offerings easily. The goal? To enhance customer retention by simplifying subscription management and facilitating brand discovery through cross-sells.

**What They Offer**  
Awtomic doesn't just cater to one type of product; their platform is adaptable for various sectors. Whether it’s wine clubs, meal kits, pet products, or beauty subscriptions, Awtomic provides the tools necessary to streamline and elevate the subscription experience. Their features include:

- **Dynamic Discounts** and promotional strategies.
- **Build-a-Box** options for customization.
- **Lifecycle Marketing** tools to optimize customer engagement.
- Robust analytics that provide insights into customer behavior and product performance.

These features allow brands to personalize their offerings and create memorable customer interactions, fostering loyalty and trust.

**Team and Backing**  
With a small, agile team of 11 and under the mentorship of Group Partner Dalton Caldwell, Awtomic is well-poised to scale as it continues expanding its support across more eCommerce platforms. The company’s presence in Seattle adds to the region's growing reputation as a tech hub, fostered by innovation in various sectors.

**Customer Success**  
Awtomic boasts impressive metrics from their clients, with reports of significant cost savings—up to 50% reduction—and increased average order values (AOV) along with reduced customer churn rates. This success speaks volumes about their platform's effectiveness in enhancing both operational efficiency and customer satisfaction.

**Conclusion**  
If you're in the DTC space and looking to harness the power of subscriptions, Awtomic presents itself as a game-changing partner. They combine a robust set of tools with an understanding of the nuances of subscription commerce, helping you not just sell products but build lasting relationships with your customers. For more insights or to schedule a demo, check out their website [Awtomic](https://www.awtomic.com). 

So, whether you’re just starting your subscription journey or looking to enhance an existing model, Awtomic might just be the solution you’ve been searching for.
